uvi.description:
watchdog: sc520_wdt: Fix possible use-after-free in wdt_turnoff()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.52 by commit a173e3b62cf6dd3c4a0a10c8a82eedfcae81a566. For more details please see the references link.
